resources.string: Mercury Droid is one kind of Internet of Things (IoT) Embedded System based on NodeMCU(ESP-8266) IoT Module. which is capable of measures and monitor the home weather and generates them in JSON data and send them to the "Node MCU (ESP8266)" IoT Server, Mercury Droid Android Mobile application read this JSON data from Node MCU(ESP-8266) IoT Server. this application has also a special feature to measures excessive threshold temperature value and gives alert to the user.
System Architecture and Application developed by "Arunav Mallik Avi (arm avi)". Department of Computer science and Engineering, National University, Bangladesh
